00019 //   JackAudio
00020 //---------------------------------------------------------
00021 
00022 class JackAudio : public Audio {
00023       int _sampleRate;
00024       int _segmentSize;
00025 
00026       jack_client_t* client;
00027       char _jackName[8];
00028       jack_port_t* portR;
00029       jack_port_t* portL;
00030 
00031       void registerClient();
00032 
00033    public:
00034       JackAudio();
00035       virtual ~JackAudio();
00036       virtual bool init();
00037       void* registerPort(const char* name);
00038       void unregisterPort(void* p);
00039       virtual std::list<QString> inputPorts();
00040       virtual bool start();
00041       virtual bool stop();
00042       int framePos() const;
00043       void connect(void*, void*);
00044       void disconnect(void* src, void* dst);
00045       float* getLBuffer(long n) { return (float*)jack_port_get_buffer(portL, n); }
00046       float* getRBuffer(long n) { return (float*)jack_port_get_buffer(portR, n); }
00047       virtual bool isRealtime() const   { return jack_is_realtime(client); }
00048       virtual void startTransport();
00049       virtual void stopTransport();
00050       virtual int getState();
00051       virtual int sampleRate() { return _sampleRate; }
00052       };

00060 class JackAudio : public Audio {
00061    public:
00062       JackAudio() {}

00065       void* registerPort(const char*) { return 0; }

00067       virtual std::list<QString> inputPorts() {
00068             std::list<QString> a;
00069             return a;
00070             }
00071       virtual bool start() { return false; }
00072       virtual bool stop()  { return false; }

00077       float* getRBuffer(long) { return 0; }

00080       virtual void stopTransport()  {}
